verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: said] [ARG1: the U.S. military would suspend some exercises that North Korea has regarded as a threat to its security , following his summit with Kim Jong Un] .
President Donald Trump said the U.S. military [V: would] suspend some exercises that North Korea has regarded as a threat to its security , following his summit with Kim Jong Un .

President Donald Trump said [ARG0: the U.S. military] [ARGM-MOD: would] [V: suspend] [ARG1: some exercises that North Korea has regarded as a threat to its security] , [ARGM-TMP: following his summit with Kim Jong Un] .
President Donald Trump said the U.S. military would suspend some exercises that North Korea [V: has] regarded as a threat to its security , following his summit with Kim Jong Un .

President Donald Trump said the U.S. military would suspend [ARG1: some exercises] [R-ARG1: that] [ARG0: North Korea] has [V: regarded] [ARG2: as a threat to its security] , following his summit with Kim Jong Un .
President Donald Trump said the U.S. military would suspend some exercises that North Korea has regarded as a threat to its security , [V: following] [ARG2: his summit with Kim Jong Un] .
